wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Wassall VC (July 1856 – 31 January 1927) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: *Private Samuel Wassall (for actions at the Battle of Isandlwana on 22 January 1879).
* Samuel Wassall – recipient of the Victoria Cross
